title: Suttum Vizhi Sudare Lyrics Ghajini
stanzas:
Suttum Vizhi Sudare Song Lyrics From Ghajini
#HarrishJayaraj #BombayJayashree, #SriramParthasarathy

Suttum vizhi sudare
Suttum vizhi sudare
en ulagam
unnai suttrudhe.

satti payyil un padam
thottu thottu urasa
en idhayam
pattri kolludhe

un vizhiyil vilundhen
vinvezhiyil parandhen
kan vizhithu
soppanam kandaen
unnaale
kan vizhithu
soppanam kandaen (2)

Mellinam marbil kanden
vallinam vizhiyil kanden
idaiyinam thaedi
illai endren.

thookkathil ularal konden
thooralil virumbi nindren
thummaal vandhaal
un ninaivai kondaen.

karuppu vellai
pookkal undaa
un kannil naan kandaen
unn kangal vandai
unnum pookkal enbaen.
unn kangal vandai
unnum pookkal enbaen.

Suttum vizhi sudare
Suttum vizhi sudare
en ulagam
unnai suttrudhe.

satti payyil un padam
thottu thottu urasa
en idhayam
pattri kolludhe

un vizhiyil vilundhen
vinvezhiyil parandhen
kan vizhithu
soppanam kandaen
unnaale
kan vizhithu
soppanam kandaen

maram koththi
manam kothi ponadhindru
udal mudal uyir varai
thandaen.

theeyindri thiriyum indri
thegangal eriyum endru
indruthaane naanum
kandu kondaen

mazhai azhagaa
veyil azhagaa
konjum podhu
vazhai azhagu
kannaa nee kobapattaal
veyyil azhagu
kannaa nee kobapattaal
veyyil azhagu

Suttum vizhi sudare
Suttum vizhi sudare
en ulagam
unnai suttrudhe.

satti payyil un padam
thottu thottu urasa
en idhayam
pattri kolludhe

un vizhiyil vilundhen
vinvezhiyil parandhen
kan vizhithu
soppanam kandaen
unnaale
kan vizhithu
soppanam kandaen
